review: I watch YouTube on this AppleTV, a Playstation3, and Macbook. By far, the poorest performance is trying to watch any video using Air-Play from the Mac to this AppleTV device. Actually using the AppleTV YouTube app, is only slightly better.  Using my PS3 yields the best viewing. Air-Play is really bad. The video is jerky and freezes every 5-6 seconds. Impossible to watch anything.

review: Despite my title, Apple TV gets a solid 4 stars. I bought this because I have Charter Cable TV and they want to charge an extra monthly fee for a 2nd cable box and service in another room. I figured if I bought this then I could watch CBS and NBC shows in my room. Nope, even with the free app, Charter cable has it blocked. So I'm basically just using this for Netflix. I do get ABC but not all the shows are on there, but that's ABC's fault, not Apple. I love the mirroring feature so I can watch HBO go on TV since charter too has that blocked on Apple TV, but the only reason why I can't give it 5 stars is Apple TV is not that intuitive. I've spent so much time in Apple community forums researching questions to certain features. I am an apple junkie with an iPhone, iPad and MacBook pro and I still had questions on this box. And unfortunatly the answer to many of my questions involves jail breaking the box. All in all this gives me the ability to watch some TV, but not all.
